attributes.action: Ask Quentin Davies to resign from his position as MP for the constituency of Grantham and Stamford
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned feel that Quentin Davies defection to the Labour party is not representative of the people of the constituency of Grantham and Stamford. Therefore Quentin Davies should step down and call for a by-election to prove he really has the backing of his constituents as a Labour MP.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
